answers.answer: Go to the hospital. You should be checked out. Good luck!
I wud go to the hospital n get my self checked again.. I hope u be fine soon.. God bless u. Do tell wat did the doc say.
I Just Hate Sitting There && They Tell Me The Same Thing! :( I Just Want This Headache To Go Away!
I would go straight to the hospital. It can be VERY serious if you are swollen like that.
A persistent headache and swelling, especially in the facial area, are signs is preeclampsia...you need to go in now. If you have this, both you and baby are at very high risk
Yes i would go to the hospital, even if the Dr is busy the nurse can check to see what your vitals are doing and start assessing you... my thought is your BP too... go get it checked

Preeclampsia (aka high blood pressure) can start at any time and, if not treated, can cause seizures, preterm labor, and even death...I'm not trying to scare you, but I just want you to know your concern is not unfounded. My cousin had the exact same problem and I convinced her to go to the hospital. She had to be induced at 32 weeks because she did, in fact have preeclampsia...I hope this isn't true for you. Good luck Hun...and update us if possible

question: I'm 31 && 5 Days Now && On Saturday Morning (3am) I Seemed To Go Into Premature Labor Which I Went To The Hospital && They Stopped It But Since Then I'm Still Having Contractions && I Just Can't Get My Headache To Go Away! (Not Even With Medicine) I Took A Nap && When I Woke Up My Hands, Feet, && Face Were Swollen! && When I'm Walking I Just Wanna Pass Out! My Boy Friend Tells Me To Call The Doctor && I Did But I Was Only Able To Talk To The Nurse ( Due To He Was Performing a Surgery). && They Just Said That I Could Be Stressed To Lay Down && Rest But I've Been Doing That && I Can't Take It Anymore! What Else Can I Do?
title: Worst Pregnancy! :(
